Code: EXEC SQL SELECT T1.NOM_PESSOA, T4.NUM_APOL_SINISTRO, T4.NOME_FAVORECIDO, T5.NUM_CERTIFICADO FROM ODS.OD_PESSOA_FISICA WHERE T1.NUM_CPF = :NUM_CPF AND T1.NUM_DV_CPF = :NUM_DV_CPF AND T1.NUM_PESSOA = T2.NUM_PESSOA AND T2.NUM_OCORR_MOVTO = T3.NUM_OCORR_MOVTO AND T3.NUM_APOL_SINISTRO = T4.NUM_APOL_SINISTRO AND T3.OCORR_HISTORICO = T4.OCORR_HISTORICO AND T3.COD_OPERACAO IN (1181,1182,1183,1184) AND T3.COD_OPERACAO = T4.COD_OPERACAO AND T4.SIT_REGISTRO = '1' AND T4.NUM_APOL_SINISTRO = T5.NUM_APOL_SINISTRO END SQL
